segments.text: I am rejoiced to tell you that you are employed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for hiring me . I'm very proud to be employed by your firm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are expected to report for on-job training on the 15th of May . Will you be there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I will . I hope I'll enjoy working with you .
segments.speaker: S2
